title: Are These The Eyes of Evil? | Supernatural Podcast
description:
Today on another horrific episode of Real Ghost Stories Online. 

As a young child peacefully puts his head down to sleep, with the wishes of sweet dreams from his parents, little does he know that he’s about to have a traumatizing paranormal experience that will scar his memory forever? 

As a pair of red eyes lock on to his, from the other side of the room, the young boy immediately starts to experience sharp pains through his body, almost as if someone, or something, possibly demonic is trying to steal his soul from his body. 

That story and much more, today on this seizure-inducing episode of Real Ghost Stories Online.

If you have a real ghost story or supernatural event to report, please write into our show or call 1-855-853-4802!
If you like the show, please help keep us on the air and support the show by becoming an EPP (Extra Podcast Person). We'll give you a BONUS episode every week as a "Thank You" for your support.
